name: RepairOrder3
description: Represents the current and past repairs or services that the customer has had. This is the third order.

sampleUtterances.utterance: Can you show the third repair order?

plainTextMessage.value: If you would like to check this order's line items please type "Line Item 3."

The current status of your repair order is "CLOSED," meaning the repair order has been completed and you have picked up the vehicle. Would you like to check for opening/closing date and time? (Yes/No)
Open Date/Time - January 10, 2020 at 6:00 pm. Close Date/Time - January 10, 2020 at 7:00 pm. To check for line items please type "Line Item 3."
